verses.verse: I beseech <S%G3870><s%> you therefore, <S%G3767><s%> brothers, <S%G80><s%> by the mercies <S%G3628><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> that you present <S%G3936><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> bodies <S%G4983><s%> a living <S%G2198><s%> sacrifice, <S%G2378><s%> holy, <S%G40><s%> acceptable <S%G2101><s%> to God, <S%G2316><s%> which is your <S%G5216><s%> reasonable <S%G3050><s%> service. <S%G2999><s%>

And be not conformed <S%G4964><s%> to this <S%G5129><s%> world: <S%G165><s%> but be you transformed <S%G3339><s%> by the renewing <S%G342><s%> of your <S%G5216><s%> mind, <S%G3563><s%> that you may prove <S%G1381><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> is that good, <S%G18><s%> and acceptable, <S%G2101><s%> and perfect, <S%G5046><s%> will <S%G2307><s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%>

For I say, <S%G3004><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> the grace <S%G5485><s%> given <S%G1325><s%> to me, to every <S%G3956><s%> man that is among <S%G1722><s%> you, not to think <S%G5252><s%> of himself more <S%G3844><s%> highly <S%G5252><s%> than he ought <S%G1163><s%> to think; <S%G5426><s%> but to think <S%G5426><s%> soberly, <S%G1519><s%> <S%G4993><s%> according as God <S%G2316><s%> has dealt <S%G3307><s%> to every <S%G1538><s%> man the measure <S%G3358><s%> of faith. <S%G4102><s%>

For as we have <S%G2192><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> members <S%G3196><s%> in one <S%G1520><s%> body, <S%G4983><s%> and all <S%G3956><s%> members <S%G3196><s%> have <S%G2192><s%> not the same <S%G846><s%> office: <S%G4234><s%>

So <S%G3779><s%> we, being many, <S%G4183><s%> are one <S%G1520><s%> body <S%G4983><s%> in Christ, <S%G5547><s%> and every <S%G2596><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> members <S%G3196><s%> one <S%G240><s%> of another. <S%G240><s%>

Having <S%G2192><s%> then <S%G1161><s%> gifts <S%G5486><s%> differing <S%G1313><s%> according <S%G2596><s%> to the grace <S%G5485><s%> that is given <S%G1325><s%> to us, whether <S%G1535><s%> prophecy, <S%G4394><s%> let us prophesy according <S%G2596><s%> to the proportion <S%G356><s%> of faith; <S%G4102><s%>
Or <S%G1535><s%> ministry, <S%G1248><s%> let us wait on <S%G1722><s%> our ministering: <S%G1248><s%> or <S%G1535><s%> he that teaches, <S%G1321><s%> on <S%G1722><s%> teaching; <S%G1319><s%>

Or <S%G1535><s%> he that exhorts, <S%G3870><s%> on <S%G1722><s%> exhortation: <S%G3874><s%> he that gives, <S%G3330><s%> let him do it with simplicity; <S%G572><s%> he that rules, <S%G4291><s%> with diligence; <S%G4710><s%> he that shows <S%G1653><s%> mercy, <S%G1653><s%> with cheerfulness. <S%G2432><s%>
Let love <S%G26><s%> be without <S%G505><s%> dissimulation. <S%G505><s%> Abhor <S%G655><s%> that which is evil; <S%G4190><s%> hold <S%G2853><s%> to that which is good. <S%G18><s%>

Be kindly <S%G5387><s%> affectionate <S%G5387><s%> one <S%G240><s%> to another <S%G240><s%> with brotherly <S%G5360><s%> love; <S%G5360><s%> in honor <S%G5092><s%> preferring <S%G4285><s%> one <S%G240><s%> another; <S%G240><s%>
Not slothful <S%G3636><s%> in business; <S%G4710><s%> fervent <S%G2204><s%> in spirit; <S%G4151><s%> serving <S%G1398><s%> the Lord; <S%G2962><s%>
Rejoicing <S%G5463><s%> in hope; <S%G1680><s%> patient <S%G5278><s%> in tribulation; <S%G2347><s%> continuing <S%G4342><s%> instant <S%G4342><s%> in prayer; <S%G4335><s%>
Distributing <S%G2841><s%> to the necessity <S%G5532><s%> of saints; <S%G40><s%> given <S%G1377><s%> to hospitality. <S%G5381><s%>
Bless <S%G2127><s%> them which persecute <S%G1377><s%> you: bless, <S%G2127><s%> and curse <S%G2672><s%> not.
Rejoice <S%G5463><s%> with them that do rejoice, <S%G5463><s%> and weep <S%G2799><s%> with them that weep. <S%G2799><s%>

Be of the same <S%G846><s%> mind <S%G5426><s%> one <S%G240><s%> toward <S%G1519><s%> another. <S%G240><s%> Mind <S%G5426><s%> not high <S%G5308><s%> things, but condescend <S%G4879><s%> to men of low <S%G5011><s%> estate. Be not wise <S%G5429><s%> in your <S%G5216><s%> own <S%G1438><s%> conceits. <S%G3844><s%> <S%G1438><s%>

Recompense <S%G591><s%> to no <S%G3367><s%> man <S%G3367><s%> evil <S%G2556><s%> for evil. <S%G2556><s%> Provide <S%G4306><s%> things honest <S%G2570><s%> in the sight <S%G1799><s%> of all <S%G3956><s%> men. <S%G444><s%>
If <S%G1487><s%> it be possible, <S%G1415><s%> as much <S%G3588><s%> as lies in you, live <S%G1514><s%> peaceably <S%G1518><s%> with all <S%G3956><s%> men. <S%G444><s%>

Dearly beloved, <S%G27><s%> avenge <S%G1556><s%> not yourselves, <S%G1438><s%> but rather give <S%G1325><s%> place <S%G5117><s%> to wrath: <S%G3709><s%> for it is written, <S%G1125><s%> Vengeance <S%G1557><s%> is mine; <S%G1698><s%> I will repay, <S%G467><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> the Lord. <S%G2962><s%>

Therefore <S%G3767><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> your <S%G4675><s%> enemy <S%G2190><s%> hunger, <S%G3983><s%> feed <S%G5595><s%> him; if <S%G1437><s%> he thirst, <S%G1372><s%> give <S%G4222><s%> him drink: <S%G4222><s%> for in so <S%G5124><s%> doing <S%G4160><s%> you shall heap <S%G4987><s%> coals <S%G440><s%> of fire <S%G4442><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> his head. <S%G2776><s%>
Be not overcome <S%G3528><s%> of evil, <S%G2556><s%> but overcome <S%G3528><s%> evil <S%G2556><s%> with good. <S%G18><s%>
